ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( status__c , "Discarded") && ISCHANGED(discarded_reason__c) && TEXT(discarded_reason__c) <> "Lead Quality" && TEXT(discarded_reason__c) <> "Rejected By TS" && OR( ISBLANK(Discarded_Description__c), LEN(Discarded_Description__c) < 25, REGEX(Discarded_Description__c, ".*(.)\\1{2,}.*") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide at least 25 characters for a valid discarded description which does not contain multiple characters in a row. (Ex: "xxxxxx" or ".......")
